original_title: フェアリーフルーツ　 プリティピーチ
overview: At first glance, a normal junior high school student, Momoko Hanayama.  However, in reality, her true identity is the Fairy Fruit Pretty Beach, which fights to protect us from invaders coming from another dimension. pinch!  Now is the time to change and fairy up !!
title: Fairy Fruit Pretty Peach
